item.description:
December 12, 2011 at 6:00 pm
Crowne Plaza Hotel
100 Berlin Road, Cromwell, CT

  

Come Network with other Real Estate Investors and Professionals in the spirit of the holiday season.

* Bring plenty of flyers, business cards, and smiles!
* There will be a cash bar.
* This event will be fun for everyone!

Don't miss the chance to network in a fun, inviting, and professional atmosphere.

This is the perfect time to introduce yourself to people, gain valuable contacts, and create lasting professional relationships that will lead you to success!

Plus Our 8th Annual Awards - be sure to nominate yourself!

 

First Prize: CT REIA Coaching Transformation
iPad (Download Application Form)

First Prize: CT REIA Member Transformation
Flat Screen Television (Download Application Form)

Second Prize:
$100 CTREIA Bucks

Third Prize:
$50 CT REIA Bucks

Submit your entries by December 8th, 2011 - You must attend to win!

Email Your Nominations To: membership@ctreia.com .

Be sure to include the following information in your email:

* Name
* Mailing Address
* Phone Number
* Email Address
* Which Award? (choose from options below or include your own):
Volunteer Of The Year
Most Creative Deal Of The Year
Rookie Of The Year
Making A Difference In The Community
Most Profitable Deal
Coaching Student Of The Year
Turning Lemons Into Lemonade
Suggest A Category
* A brief, 100 word or less, description of why you're making this nomination.

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: CT REIA Annual Holiday Dinner For Real Estate Investors
